value:
$WmMPID_ハロレア,ch17_37_Rare_F_Halloween21,Face|There you are! I've been looking all—
Oh? And who is this child with you?$k$p$WmMPID_ベレト,ch17_05_Sothis_FM_Pair,Face|Right. How do I put this...$k$p$nMPID_比翼ソティス|(Psst! Quickly! Think of something
already! And make it good!)$k$p$nMPID_ベレト|(That isn't helpful...)$k$p$WmMPID_ハロクルトナーガ,ch11_23_Kurt_M_Halloween21,Face|Aha! Another fellow costumed
festival-goer! What world is it
that you hail from?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロソフィーヤ,ch02_04_Sofiya_F_Halloween21,Face|Perhaps we ought to leave this one
alone... It doesn't look like he's in
the mood for storytelling.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_Halloween21,Face|...What is it about these clothes that
makes you think you can engage me
with such meaningless blathering?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE09_06,0|$WmMPID_ハロクルトナーガ,ch11_23_Kurt_M_Halloween21,Face|While it is a shame not everyone is
willing to discuss their world... I have
learned so much from Lady Rhea.$k$pI had not imagined that other worlds
might have their own divine creators
as well... We may not be so different.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロソフィーヤ,ch02_04_Sofiya_F_Halloween21,Face|Perhaps... But I have had just about
enough excitement for one day.
I may need to lie down...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロクルトナーガ,ch11_23_Kurt_M_Halloween21,Face|It is a bit overwhelming to learn that
our similarities extend beyond even
our basic forms...$k$pViolence seems to invade the
lives of even those most lofty
of civilizations.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロソフィーヤ,ch02_04_Sofiya_F_Halloween21,Face|Be that as it may, we have to believe
that someday people will come to
their senses and forsake violence.$k$pI believe a day will come when all
peoples can live together in peace.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロクルトナーガ,ch11_23_Kurt_M_Halloween21,Face|As you say. We must keep our eyes
forward, focused on our hopes...$k$pWar-weary, Goldoa once shuttered
its borders and resolved to live in
self-imposed isolation.$k$pBut turning away from a problem will
not itself solve the problem. It only
allows the problem to grow unabated.$k$pWe must instead face our differences—
and celebrate them. Only then can
we hope to move forward.$k$pYou and the others here have taught
me much in such a short time. I am
glad to have had this opportunity.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロソフィーヤ,ch02_04_Sofiya_F_Halloween21,Face|I'm happy to hear you say so,
Prince Kurthnaga. I feel much
the same.$k$pThe world outside of Nabata is vast.
I'm sure Fae will also gain a lot from
my tales.$k$pThe tales I've heard here surely
mean there are at least some friendly
people out there.$k$pAs long as we are able to find each
other, the world is sure to keep
growing better and better.$k$p$Sbs150|
